name: Eyal de Lara
content: Home Page Eyal de Lara Professor and Chair Computer Systems and Networks Group Department of Computer Science University of Toronto Bahen Centre for Information Technology 40 St. George Street Toronto, Ontario M5S 2E4 Email: delara@cs.toronto.edu Phone: 416 946-8656 Fax: 416 978-4765 Office: BA5234 Research My research interests include distributed systems, cloud, edge and mobile computing.
